thread.title: David Sedaris on a 12-Page Attention Span

author: Ellen Gamerman
title: David Sedaris on a 12-Page Attention Span
text:
For years, the humorist David Sedaris thought 62 would be a good age to die.
Now that he’s 61, he’s reconsidering.
“Calypso,” Mr. Sedaris’s new essay collection on sale next week, delivers dispatches from his march through middle age. The book includes tales from his purchase of a beach cottage in North Carolina and his proposal to longtime...
